note.p: Mariner. Only mate certificate, 1854; first mate, 1856; master, 1860. Mate and later first officer on the London Missionary Society ship, John Williams, from 1856; captain from at least 1871 until 1894.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 30 January 2014)
UK and Ireland, masters and mates certificates, 1850–1927 (Ancestry.com, accessed 30 January 2014).
